trustfund:
TF023762-TFET - IBRD OPERATING COSTS
            ASSOCIATED WITH THE TRUST FUND FOR EAST TIM,TF023623-TFET - EAST TIMOR DILI
            COMMUNITY EMPLOYMENT GENERATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Dili community Employment Generation
            Project aims to generate short term employment; raise urban
            incomes; and build social capital through community-managed
            environmental clean-up. The project has one component, for
            labor intensive activities of debris collection and solid
            waste management. With a duration of five months, the
            project will be divided into three stages: 1) A pilot stage
            involving one community in the most urgent area of Dili to
            establish recruitment and related procedures and their
            effectiveness. This phase will concentrate on the cleaning
            up of rubble and debris before moving onto refuse removal.
            2) A second stage involving cleaning of rubble and debris
            from within some 25 functional villages within Dili. 3) When
            building-rubble and debris is substantially cleared from
            within a community attention will focus on the collection
            and removal of domestic refuse. Benefits from the project
            will derive from: a) social stabilization established by the
            provision of short term employment; b) injection of funds
            caused by wage payments into local communities; c) public
            health improvements created by environmental enhancement; d)
            community confidence in reconstruction efforts created by
            visual impact of cleaning the city; and e) social
            reintegration within and between communities initiated by
            community cooperation.
